author: liyin
msg: The reason of being unstable is that after you force a flush on regions of META table, it's possible some other updates to META table is inserted before asserting. Then the mem-store is non empty again and the testcase failed.
The workaround is to skip assertion for the server with META table's regions.

author: liyin
msg: Adding ScheduledExecutor to deal with thread creation and execution instead of doing that via creating new Thread.
Also making the code a little bit smaller with that :)
Test Plan: created a unit test which spawns 10 client threads doing 10k puts each

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10709] Fix the bug of rejecting exception in HTableClientScanner when too many scanner running at the same time.
Background thread is no longer blocked waiting for main thread to consume the data.
